scripts.recert: rm -rf cert && mkdir cert && openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -new -nodes -x509 -days 3650 -keyout cert/key.pem -subj "/C=UA/ST=Kyiv Region/L=Kyiv/O=imazzine!/CN=*.*/" -out cert/cert.pem
scripts.globalize: rm -rf $(npm root --global)/mln.io && rm -rf $(npm bin --global)/mln.io && ln -s $(pwd) $(npm root --global)/mln.io && ln -s $(pwd)/bin.js $(npm bin --global)/mln.io
scripts.compile: rm -rf lib && tsc -b ./tsconfig/cjs.json ./tsconfig/types.json && mv lib/types/src/* lib/types/ && rm -d lib/types/src && mv lib/cjs/src/* lib/cjs/ && rm -d lib/cjs/src && find ./lib -type f -name *.tsbuildinfo -delete && find ./lib -type d -name tsconfig -delete
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage && npm run compile && npm run docs
